title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
03:05 <jvelociter> has quit  
05:07 <sdumitriu> has quit  
06:13 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:46 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:16 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:18 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rb5e4dbc / (6 files in 6 dirs): Merge branch 'master' of github.com:xwiki/xwiki-platform into feature-applicationWithinMinutes (+9 more commits...) - http://git.io/jYiWCA  
07:21 <mflorea> has quit  
07:21 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:35 <sdumitriu> has quit  
07:35 <sburjan`> has quit  
07:42 <tekzilla> has quit  
07:46 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
08:03 <jlagarde> has joined #xwiki  
08:47 <vmassol> good morning  
08:47 <vmassol> so today is 3.3M1 release day  
08:47 <AndreasJonsson> has quit  
08:54 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
09:08 <AndreasJonsson> has joined #xwiki  
09:16 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning, are you merging your work on master now?  
09:18 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r275f873 / (11 files in 9 dirs): XCOMMONS-52: Add Component Archetype to XWiki Commons - http://git.io/qm-w4w  
09:19 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* re82e956 / (13 files in 10 dirs): XWIKI-7098: Remove Component Archetype from XWiki Platform - http://git.io/YCVexg  
09:47 <+mflorea> vmassol: before the release. If Sergiu releases today then I'll merge today. It only takes a few minutes to merge. I still have stuff to commit.  
09:47 <vmassol> ok…. but be careful that you need a few hours to validate the merge  
09:47 <vmassol> the functional tests need to pass  
09:47 <vmassol> and it needs to be tested in real at least once  
09:48 <vmassol> last time we did a feature branch merge it took us several days to stabilize the merge  
09:48 <vmassol> (last 2 times actually)  
09:48 <+mflorea> well, let's not generalize, in this case it's a bunch of new wiki pages  
09:49 <+mflorea> nothing is changed in the platform  
09:49 <vmassol> indeed should be simpler  
09:49 <+mflorea> what could fail are the validation tests  
09:51 <+mflorea> we haven't agreed on the space and module name yet  
09:51 <vmassol> yep, problem is that not many committers will be online today (it's bank holiday in France tomorrow and most are on holidays today)  
09:52 <+mflorea> ok  
09:52 <vmassol> so I propose to go ahead with what you replied  
09:52 <vmassol> and change later on if it's a problem  
09:52 <+mflorea> ok  
09:52 <+mflorea> I'll rename the space and module name on the branch  
09:52 <vmassol> k  
10:06 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <jlagarde> has quit  
10:18 <+sburjan> good morning  
10:18 <+sburjan> it seems we have a bug in 3.2. Each time I start my wiki, I get the XWiki.XWikiPreferences re-saved  
10:32 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:07 <+mflorea> sburjan: please open a jira issue

14:50 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
15:23 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
15:24 <sdumitriu> has quit  
15:24 <jvelociter> has quit  
15:25 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
15:28 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
15:29 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Do you want to take over the build manager role?  
15:30 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hi, are you doing the release today?  
15:30 <@sdumitriu> Yes, that's the plan  
15:30 <vmassol> k cool  
15:30 <@sdumitriu> But last time I checked there wasn't much to release  
15:30 <vmassol> mflorea hasn't merged yet I think  
15:30 <@sdumitriu> Only a few bugfixes and small improvement  
15:30 <@sdumitriu> s  
15:31 <vmassol> mflorea said he'd merge only if you released today  
15:31 <vmassol> mflorea: ?  
15:31 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: yea, I can be the build manager this week  
15:31 <@sdumitriu> Hm, seems there are more issues now, 59  
15:31 <+mflorea> vmassol: yes, sdumitriu: when do you start the release?  
15:32 <@sdumitriu> ASAP  
15:32 <@sdumitriu> I would have liked to have the Oracle issues fixed  
15:33 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: IIRC, you mentioned a virtual machine image with Oracle set up, right?  
15:33 <@sdumitriu> I tried to get it to work locally but faild  
15:33 <vmassol> yep  
15:33 <+mflorea> ok, I need to fix one issue reported by sburjan and then I'll merge the appWithinMinutes branch  
15:33 <vmassol> I have used a vmware one a long time ago  
15:34 <+mflorea> sburjan: did you open a jira issue?  
15:34 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I think it was http://www.vmware.com/appliances/directory/62414  
15:34 <vmassol> (a bit old now)  
15:36 <+sburjan> mflorea: no, let me report it now  
15:36 <+mflorea> thanks  
15:40 <+sburjan> mflorea: XWIKI-7109  
15:44 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Still no HTML in the notification emails  
15:44 <vmassol> yep, haven't looked further why  
15:44 <vmassol> I have no clue ATM  
15:45 <vmassol> maybe the list is set to strip HTML, haven't checked that  
15:52 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <@sdumitriu> I'm going away for 1.5h

17:00 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r9234bca / (18 files in 3 dirs): Merge branch 'feature-applicationWithinMinutes' - http://git.io/zqfKqA  
17:08 <DrLou> has quit  
17:08 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
17:09 <+mflorea> vmassol: I need a jira component for AppWithinMinutes (named "App Within Minutes"?)  
17:10 <vmassol> mflorea: yep  
17:10 <+mflorea> I'll add it  
17:12 <+mflorea> I see there a "Component Lead" field but we left it empty so far  
17:27 <vmassol> yes  
17:27 <vmassol> the reason being that we want shared code ownership  
17:27 <Denis> has quit

17:28 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7110: Implement a first version of the class editor that will be used by App Within Minutes  
17:28 <CIA-102> \* Include App Within Minutes in the default XWiki Enterprise XAR. - http://git.io/XJ\_gzA  
17:31 <sburjan> has quit  
17:33 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r9cb04a2 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7109: XWiki.XWikiPreferences is re-saved on each restart - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9cb04a27bb12b1cefad51469ae519a2cc8b7e538  
17:33 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r9234bca / (18 files in 3 dirs): Merge branch 'feature-applicationWithinMinutes' - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9234bca1bb6eecb5f546aee3c86e6ec4fc6b2cc1  
18:01 <vmassol> jvelociter: good try....  
18:05 <+jvelociter> :)  
18:06 <+jvelociter> cool feature  
18:06 <+jvelociter> is it update live ?  
18:06 <+jvelociter> \*updated  
18:06 <vmassol> it's performant (if that's the question) :)  
18:06 <vmassol> it's done with a macro transformation  
18:06 <vmassol> which spanws a checker thread  
18:06 <+jvelociter> nice  
18:06 <vmassol> and the checked link status are kept in memory  
18:07 <+jvelociter> so it´s all async  
18:07 <vmassol> and the LT uses that memory store  
18:07 <vmassol> and same links are rechecked only after N minutes  
18:07 <vmassol> yep async  
18:07 <vmassol> I've committed the transformation in master yesterday  
18:07 <+jvelociter> you mean rendering transformation, not macro T  
18:08 <+jvelociter> ok  
18:08 <vmassol> right  
18:08 <+jvelociter> it´s not a default transformation though ?  
18:08 <vmassol> correct  
18:08 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XRENDERING-154  
18:08 <+jvelociter> cool  
18:09 <vmassol> I had some fun over the week end ;)  
18:10 <vmassol> btw on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/ExternalLinkStatus2 I've implemented negative filtering  
18:10 <vmassol> (on the code column)  
18:10 <vmassol> try !200 for example  
18:10 <vmassol> (that part was easy to do)  
18:22 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:30 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Done with the merge?  
18:30 <+mflorea> yes  
18:30 <@sdumitriu> OK, rebooting then starting the release

23:13 <[1]jer> has quit  
23:25 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Is there any documentation about the new class wizard?  
23:28 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: well, it's not a class wizard, it's an edit sheet for documents holding class definitions. If you need a few words for the release notes then I can write them in the morning.  
23:28 <@sdumitriu> Ah...  
23:28 <@sdumitriu> I would need that now  
23:28 <@sdumitriu> I can do it, no problem  
23:28 <@sdumitriu> Was just wondering if you already have some text or screenshots  
23:30 <+mflorea> to answer your question: no, there isn't any documentation. There is the design made my Caty, but I haven't followed it 100% and it's not fully implemented (i.e. some parts of the design haven't been implemented yet). There is also the mail I wrote on devs, where I give the steps to test it.  
23:30 <+mflorea> I put the links on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7110
